testimonials.title: What our clients say

heatPump.title: Heat Pumps
heatPump.subtitle: High-Efficiency Air Source
heatPump.description: Heat pump technology replaces gas and oil boilers. It uses thermal energy from outdoor air to heat your home and domestic hot water with exceptional efficiency.
heatPump.details: Unlike traditional systems that burn fuel, the heat pump simply transfers heat. For every kWh of electricity consumed, it delivers up to 4 kWh of heat (COP of 4.0).

solar.title: Solar Energy
solar.subtitle: Photovoltaic Self-Consumption
solar.description: Produce your own clean and free electricity. Our photovoltaic systems are specifically sized for your consumption profile, maximizing return on investment.
solar.details: We use latest-generation monocrystalline panels with PERC technology, ensuring production even in cloudy weather. The system directly powers the home with solar priority.

battery.title: Storage
battery.subtitle: Smart Batteries
battery.description: Don't waste solar energy produced during the day. Store the surplus in advanced lithium batteries to use it for free at night.
battery.details: Our hybrid storage solutions manage energy intelligently: first the home, then the batteries, and finally the grid, ensuring self-sufficiency above 80%.

evCharging.title: EV Charging
evCharging.subtitle: Electric Mobility
evCharging.description: Charge your electric vehicle quickly, safely, and intelligently, integrating the charger with your solar production to drive 'for free'.
evCharging.details: Smart wallboxes communicating with the meter. Automatic load balancing to avoid tripping breakers and charging only with solar surplus.

smartHome.title: Home Automation
smartHome.subtitle: Smart Home
smartHome.description: Total control in the palm of your hand. Centralize energy, climate, and security management in a single intuitive application.
smartHome.details: Total ecosystem integration. Create scenarios like 'I'm leaving' that turns off lights and lowers heating, or 'Vacation' that simulates presence.

hvac.title: Air Conditioning
hvac.subtitle: Thermal Comfort
hvac.description: Air Conditioning and Underfloor Heating solutions ensuring perfect temperature in every room, with maximum energy efficiency.
hvac.details: We design the ideal thermal distribution solution for your home's architecture. Silent inverter systems with advanced air filtration and Wi-Fi control.

section.title: Our
section.subtitle: Each service has been designed to work independently or integrated into a complete energy independence solution.

heatPumps.title: Heat Pumps
heatPumps.description: Heat pump technology replaces oil and gas boilers. It uses thermal energy from the outside air to heat your home with exceptional efficiency.
heatPumps.highlight: Thanks to the vapor injection system, it maintains 100% of its heating capacity even at -15°C.

solar.title: Solar Energy
solar.description: Produce your own clean, free electricity. Our photovoltaic systems are specifically sized for your consumption profile, maximizing return on investment.
solar.highlight: Monocrystalline PERC panels with a 25-year linear production warranty and efficiency exceeding 21%.

battery.title: Energy Storage
battery.description: Maximize your energy independence by storing solar surplus. Use your free energy even at night or during grid outages.
battery.highlight: Lithium Iron Phosphate (LFP) batteries with +6000 life cycles and 90% depth of discharge.

evCharging.title: EV Charging
evCharging.description: Integrate electric mobility into your ecosystem. Charge your car with solar surplus and reduce your fuel costs to zero.
evCharging.highlight: Smart chargers with dynamic load balancing protecting your electrical panel.

hvac.title: Air Conditioning
hvac.description: Air conditioning and underfloor heating solutions guaranteeing perfect temperature in every room, with maximum energy efficiency.
hvac.highlight: Quiet inverter systems with advanced air filtration and integrated Wi-Fi control.

footer.tagline: Leaders in sustainable energy solutions. We transform houses into efficient and eco-friendly homes.

blackout.title: Grid Outage Mode
blackout.subtitle: Your home keeps running
blackout.footer: * With our islanding technology, switching to battery power is seamless (less than 10ms).

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Questions about energy transition? We clarify everything.

warranty.q: How do warranty and maintenance work?
warranty.a: We offer a 25-year warranty on solar panel performance and lifetime technical support. Our solutions include annual preventive maintenance to ensure maximum efficiency.

savings.q: How much can I save on my energy bill?
savings.a: With an integrated system (Photovoltaic + Battery + Heat Pump), savings can reach 80% per year, drastically reducing dependence on the public electricity grid.

subsidies.a: Yes, there are various cantonal and federal aids (Pronovo) for renewable energy installation. Our team handles all the bureaucratic process and applications for you.

installation.a: After project approval, physical installation typically takes 2 to 3 days, depending on system complexity and size. We guarantee minimal impact on your daily routine.

hero.title: Energy Excellence
hero.subtitle: Since 2015
hero.description: All excellence is born from a journey. Chez Energie was born from the vision of making renewable energy accessible, beautiful and smart for every Swiss home.

mission.title: Self-Sufficiency that Respects the Planet and Your Wallet
mission.p1: Chez Energie was born with a clear goal: to make homes and businesses in Geneva and its region self-sufficient. We believe that the energy of the future is decentralized, clean, and, above all, economical.
mission.p2: We don't just sell equipment; we offer energy freedom and high-standard thermal comfort.

heatPump.title: Heat Pumps
heatPump.description: Replace old boilers with maximum efficiency. Heat your home by extracting thermal energy from the air, drastically reducing costs.

solar.title: Solar Panels
solar.description: Turn your roof into a financial asset. Produce your own clean electricity and protect yourself against rising rates.

hvac.title: Air Conditioning
hvac.description: Absolute comfort in all seasons. Silent and intelligent systems guaranteeing perfect temperature, summer and winter.

battery.title: Batteries and Storage
battery.description: Use the sun even at night. Store excess solar production to ensure autonomy and security against grid outages.

charging.title: Charging Points
charging.description: The gas station is your garage. Fast and intelligent chargers integrated into your solar system for zero-cost mobility.

whyUs.title: Why Chez Energie?
whyUs.description: In a complex market, we bring simplicity and confidence. Our approach is technical, transparent, and focused on the long term.

certified.title: Certified Professional Installation
certified.description: Qualified technicians rigorously following Swiss safety and quality standards.

localSupport.title: Local Technical Support
localSupport.description: We are in Geneva. Our support is close, fast, and speaks your language.

trustedTech.title: Trusted Technology
trustedTech.description: We work only with world-leading brands to guarantee durability and performance.

stat.label: Commitment to satisfaction and technical quality.
